timeline.title: Founding Ceremony Parade
timeline.description: The first military parade of the People's Republic of China, marking the founding of New China.
timeline.descriptionZh: 中华人民共和国第一次军事阅兵，标志着新中国的成立。

timeline.title: 35th Anniversary Parade
timeline.description: First parade after the Cultural Revolution, showcasing China's military modernization.
timeline.descriptionZh: 文革后首次阅兵，展示中国军队现代化成果。

timeline.title: 50th Anniversary Parade
timeline.description: Celebrated half a century of the People's Republic with advanced military technology.
timeline.descriptionZh: 庆祝共和国成立50周年，展示先进军事技术。

timeline.title: 60th Anniversary Parade
timeline.description: Demonstrated China's growing military capabilities in the 21st century.
timeline.descriptionZh: 展示21世纪中国不断增长的军事实力。

timeline.title: Victory Day Parade
timeline.description: Commemorated the 70th anniversary of victory in the War of Resistance against Japanese Aggression.
timeline.descriptionZh: 纪念中国人民抗日战争暨世界反法西斯战争胜利70周年。

timeline.title: 70th Anniversary Parade
timeline.description: Showcased China's military modernization achievements in the new era.
timeline.descriptionZh: 展示新时代中国军队现代化建设成就。

timeline.title: 80th Victory Anniversary Parade
timeline.description: Commemorating 80 years of victory in the War of Resistance against Japanese Aggression and World Anti-Fascist War, showcasing China's commitment to peace and development.
timeline.descriptionZh: 纪念中国人民抗日战争暨世界反法西斯战争胜利80周年，展示中国对和平与发展的承诺。
highlightsZh: 人工智能集成防务系统
